Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Contilia places you in the heart of Rome, walking distance from Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore and Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore. This family-friendly hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 60 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 60 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

A stay at Hotel Contilia places you in the heart of Rome, walking distance from Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore and Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore. This family-friendly hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Prassede - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Massimo alle Terme - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Diocletian Bath - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Octagonal Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
National Museum of Oriental Art - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza Vittorio Emanuele II - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza della Repubblica - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Maria degli Angeli - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Teatro Ambra Jovinelli - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Baths of Trajan - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Colle Oppio Park - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Palace of Expositions - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 23.6 km / 14.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Contilia is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
